meanings.definition: The branch of medicine dealing with anesthesia and anesthetics.
meanings.sent1: Studying anaesthesiology involves learning about different types of anesthesia.
meanings.sent2: Anaesthesiology is an important field in the medical profession.
meanings.sent3: The party clown decided to study anaesthesiology to learn how to make people fall asleep with a joke.
meanings.sent4: In the world of medicine, anaesthesiology acts as the silent guardian during surgeries.
meanings.sent5: The professor made anaesthesiology come alive with vivid demonstrations in class.

meanings.sent1: The hospital's anaesthesiology department ensures patients are comfortable during procedures.
meanings.sent2: Anaesthesiology requires precision and care to keep patients safe.
meanings.sent3: The magician's anaesthesiology skills were so good that he could make a rabbit fall asleep instantly.
meanings.sent4: In the world of surgery, anaesthesiology is like a gentle lullaby before the operation begins.
meanings.sent5: The nurse's expertise in anaesthesiology made the patient's experience smooth and painless.
